00009 /*************************************************************/
00010 /* Purpose: Provides the mechanism for recognizing and       */
00011 /*   parsing the various types of patterns that can be used  */
00012 /*   in the LHS of a rule. In version 6.0, the only pattern  */
00013 /*   types provided are for deftemplate and instance         */
00014 /*   patterns.                                               */
00015 /*                                                           */
00016 /* Principal Programmer(s):                                  */
00017 /*      Gary D. Riley                                        */
00018 /*                                                           */
00019 /* Contributing Programmer(s):                               */
00020 /*                                                           */
00021 /* Revision History:                                         */
00022 /*                                                           */
00023 /*      6.24: Removed LOGICAL_DEPENDENCIES compilation flag. */
00024 /*                                                           */
00025 /*            Renamed BOOLEAN macro type to intBool.         */
00026 /*                                                           */
00027 /*************************************************************/
